"}, {"content": "
The person who eats healthy food is physically active.

The person who eats healthy food is physically active because they are able to move their body and perform physical activities. This includes things like walking, running, swimming, cycling, and other activities that require physical exertion. 

The person with cerebral palsy is physically active because they are able to move their body and perform physical activities, but they may need assistance or modifications to do so. This can include things like using assistive technology, such as a wheelchair or communication device, to help them perform physical activities.
